metadata.description: Can the brand-new Spider-Man master his new powers in time to take on the villainous Vulture?  When a giant robot spider attacks New York, Spider-Man must prove his innocence by tracking down the scientist responsible: the diabolical Dr. Octopus! When the sinister Sandman assaults Midtown High, it's up to Peter to stop him - even if must risk revealing his secret identity!
metadata.name: Giant-Size Spider-Man
